message: I'm being generous, Bob! Let's split the money fairly. You get 10% and I'll take the rest.
I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a small chunk too. It's a good compromise!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split the money more evenly this time. I'll take 60%, and you can have 40%.  It's a win-win!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a bit less, but I still want a bigger share. It's my turn to be generous...ish.
Bob, we're going back and forth, and the money is losing value. Let's just be fair and split it evenly this time. We can both walk away with a decent amount.
